tool_description:
Use your Google Spreadsheet as a database, without any dependency.

To start using this API, you have to add our email and give us permissions to edit your spreadsheet.
`rapidapi-google-sheets@singular-hub-398921.iam.gserviceaccount.com`
(Remember to set the permissions to `Editor`).
name: Google Spreadsheets
title: Google Spreadsheets

api_list.name: Clear rows
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://google-spreadsheets.p.rapidapi.com/spreadsheet/1F6qdlLjk0WslVUfIStrKHA0YCbOnPTdlPdi/sheet/0/clear_rows"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-spreadsheets.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://google-spreadsheets.p.rapidapi.com/spreadsheet/{spreadsheet}/sheet/{sheet}/clear_rows"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-spreadsheets.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Add rows

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-spreadsheets.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Set header
api_list.description: Set the header to use it as a column name.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://google-spreadsheets.p.rapidapi.com/spreadsheet/1F6qdlLjk0WslVUfIStrKHA0YCbOnPTdlPdi/sheet/0/set_header"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-spreadsheets.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Update properties

url = "https://google-spreadsheets.p.rapidapi.com/spreadsheet/1F6qdlLjk0WslVUfIStrKHA0YCbOnPTdlPdi/update_properties"

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-spreadsheets.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
